title: $1000 Off 1st Month! Sophisticated Lakeside Living, Just Steps to Lake

those dreams come true.', 'Apartment living is also measured by features and amenities.', 'We have given careful consideration to raising the standards for our residents when it comes to amenities.', 'Pet services, a cardio center, a rooftop deck and boutique lobby with fireplace--these are the kind of indulgences few rentals, if any, can offer.', 'Uptown is an eclectic, vibrant, business, entertainment, and constantly changing area.', "Our exceptional location means you're within steps of anything you could possibly desire.", ' Conveniently located in Uptown Minneapolis means the finest in dining trends, high-style shopping, hottest nightspots, hippest galleries, beautiful parks, Greenway bike trails, and famed Chain-of-Lakes can literally become your backyard.', 'Prices and
